findings.recommendation: Pin a specific version tag instead of 'latest' to ensure reproducible builds.

findings.description: Dockerfile does not specify a USER and will run as root by default.
findings.recommendation: Add a non-root USER to reduce the impact of a container compromise.

findings.description: One or more containers are running in privileged mode.
findings.recommendation: Avoid privileged containers; use fine-grained capabilities instead.

findings.description: Nginx is configured with 'server_tokens on', exposing version info.
findings.recommendation: Set 'server_tokens off;' to avoid leaking Nginx version information in responses.

findings.description: TLS is configured without explicitly setting 'ssl_protocols'.
findings.recommendation: Set 'ssl_protocols TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;' (or your org's policy) to avoid weak protocols.
